entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Only suggestions for types are shown after typing `.` following `is SomeType` pattern #70226
  • SymbolAsMember API produces unexpected result for tuple members #70225
    17.9
  • Annoying completion when trying to insert a semi-colon in a switch expression #70224
  • Compiler could/should be better in how it emits equality for records. #70221
  • C#: IntelliSense unimported suggestion items does not automatically add global namespace to using statement it adds #70218
  • GetConversion yields incorrect result on collection expression with spread in error case #70217
    17.9

Closed

  • To prevent an unsafe abort when evaulating the function #39559
    Backlog
  • Exceptions in WithDocumentContentsFrom after upgrading analyzers #70008
    17.8 P3
  • C# Interactive Window should default to .NET Core if the current project targets it #63563
    Backlog
  • dotnet build-server shutdown doesn't work on MacOs #70166
    17.9
  • Collection expressions: rectify ctor check in conversions #70182
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Create and cache a singleton directive parser inside the lexer #70223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: ImmutableArray optimization #70222
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve checksum perf #70220
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Immunize System.Linq methods #70219
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Small piece of fallout from teh prior progress API pr. #70215
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Insert Roslyn 17.8 to VS 17.8 #70216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove newly doc'd rules #69259
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add Global prefix to VBCSCompiler mutex to make it visible on nix systems #70189
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: update rules for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Restore "Do source-generation only in our OOP process" #70109
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Include implicit MyBase.New() call in IBlockOperation for VB Constructors #69873
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, untriaged
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2281126 #70204
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #69761
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • IDE changes for respecting code style severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' entries in command line builds #69844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix missing space for numeric token #70135 #70202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.8
  • Expose AnalysisContext.MinimumReportedSeverity #70131
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Synthesized members #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
